scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn prepare:mainnet && yarn build:all && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ odyssy-automaton/daohaus-stats
scripts.deploy:xdai: yarn prepare:xdai && yarn build:all && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ odyssy-automaton/daohaus-stats-xdai

scripts.deploy:rinkeby: yarn prepare:rinkeby && yarn build:all && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ odyssy-automaton/daohaus-stats-rinkeby
scripts.deploy:arbitrum: yarn prepare:kovan && yarn build:all && yarn prepare:arbitrum && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ odyssy-automaton/daohaus-stats-arbitrum
scripts.deploy:celo: yarn prepare:kovan && yarn build:all && yarn prepare:celo && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ odyssy-automaton/daohaus-stats-celo
